queries.description: Make sure that for SQL Servers, 'Auditing' is set to 'On'

queries.query_name: SQL Server Predictable Active Directory Account Name
queries.description: Azure SQL Server must avoid using predictable Active Directory Administrator Account names, like 'Admin', which means the attribute 'login' must be set to a name that is not easy to predict

queries.query_name: SQL Server Predictable Admin Account Name
queries.description: Azure SQL Server's Admin account login must avoid using names like 'Admin', that are too predictable, which means the attribute 'administrator_login' must be set to a name that is not easy to predict

queries.description: Flow logs enable capturing information about IP traffic flowing in and out of the network security groups. Network Security Group Flow Logs must be enabled with retention period greater than or equal to 90 days. This is important, because these logs are used to check for anomalies and give information of suspected breaches
Make sure that for MSSQL Server, the Auditing Retention is greater than 90 days
Make sure for SQL Servers that Auditing Retention is greater than 90 days

queries.query_name: Storage Table Allows All ACL Permissions

files.expected_value: azurerm_storage_table[table_resource].acl.permissions does not allow all ACL permissions

queries.description: Azure SQL Server Accessibility must be set to a minimal address range, which means the difference between the values of the 'end_ip_address' and 'start_ip_address' must be lesser than 256. Additionally, both ips must be different from '0.0.0.0'

files.expected_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[fail].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is lesser than 256
files.actual_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[fail].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is greater than or equal to 256

files.expected_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[fail].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is lesser than 256
files.actual_value: 'azurerm_sql_firewall_rule[fail].start_ip_address' The difference between the value of the 'end_ip_address' and of 'start_ip_address' is greater than or equal to 256
